content: We delivered solid first quarter results, driven by the continued strength of our new AI business, more specifically, revenues from Baidu AI Cloud increased by 45% year-over-year. Baidu AI Cloud maintained its fast growth momentum, benefiting from the digital and intelligent transformation of China's traditional industries and the public service sector as well as our cutting-edge AI technologies. Please ask the question. And within non-ad, we believe our new AI businesses, like Baidu AI Cloud and Intelligent Driving, are well geared with China's goal in technology innovation, digital economy and green transition. Please ask the question. Please ask the question. Please ask the question. Please ask the question. Please ask the question. Baidu AI Cloud is already the revenue growth engine for us, as we are benefiting from the digital and intelligent transformation of China's traditional industries and the public service sector. Please ask the question.
